title: S14 Ep88: The Presence of the Anomalous in Psychotherapy
itunes:title: The Presence of the Anomalous in Psychotherapy
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS goes to therapy today with The Presence of the Anomalous in Psychotherapy and Dr. Paul J. Leslie!

Today we examine and discuss the appearance of the strange and paranormal throughout the history of psychotherapy, as well as, discuss modern first person accounts from therapists who have experienced anomalous activity in their therapy sessions.

Get the book here: https://amazon.com
